text: All these years later I still love this song
author: StevenTravelCaptainRogers

text:
I distinctly remember this song from No More Heroes. Watch the TV in that game and you're treated to a music video whose vocals match this song; mainly the "Let's fly away, flyyyy awaaaay" line.
Now that I looked it up, I realise this song is a remix of that music video.
author: Medal Melodies

text: I first found your channel while searching for the Croc 2 minecart music, and I have to say, you have the most refined taste in videogame soundtracks I've ever seen! Keep up the good work!

text: Another game I really want to play, mostly because of the trippy visuals going on. I remember some reviewers saying this game was actually better with Kinect. I don't have it so I'll just play the game with a normal controller, but I'd be intrigued to try it out with it. Awesome music by Genki Rockets too.

author: William Warren

text: @Evu Ideally, that'd be a great thing to do, but it'd require too much time for me to do so since I'd have to think of similar tracks everytime, out of a huge list. The only thing currently that comes close is the Relaxin' playlist which regroups ambient/laid-back tracks.
